statement: Write a function that returns the factorial of a given number.
Write a function to check if a given number is prime.
Write a function to reverse a string.
Write a program to find the sum of all elements in a list.
Write a function to check if a string is a palindrome.
Write a program to find the largest element in a list.
Write a function to calculate the Fibonacci sequence.
Write a program to sort a list of elements using the bubble sort algorithm.
Write a function to count the number of occurrences of a character in a string.
Write a program to generate the Fibonacci sequence up to a certain number of terms.
Write a function to calculate the factorial of a given number using recursion.
Write a program to find the factorial of a large number using BigInteger in Python.
Write a program to implement binary search.
Write a program to find the GCD (Greatest Common Divisor) of two numbers.
Write a function to check if a given number is a perfect number.
Write a program to find the roots of a quadratic equation.
Write a function to generate all possible permutations of a list.
Write a program to implement selection sort.
Write a program to implement insertion sort.
Write a program to implement merge sort.
